atk-s0402a49:2_1: Catutthassa paṭhame upapattipaṭilābhiyānīti yehi anantarā upapattiṁ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0402a49:2_3: Sakadāgāmissāti idaṁ appahīnasaṁyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā gahitaṁ.
atk-s0402a49:2_4: Yasmā pana antarāparinibbāyissa antarā upapatti natthi,
atk-s0402a49:2_5: yaṁ pana so tattha jhānaṁ samāpajjati,
atk-s0402a49:2_6: taṁ kusalattā ‘‘upapattibhavassa paccayo’’ teva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
atk-s0402a49:2_9: Orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṁ upādāya sakadāgāmissa avisesena ‘‘orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni appahīnānī’’ti vuttaṁ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-s0402a49:4_1: Dutiye yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhānoti pañhaṁ kathento yuttameva katheti, sīghaṁ pana na katheti, saṇikameva kathetīti attho.
atk-s0402a49:6_1: Tatiye catunnampi puggalānaṁ iminā suttena viseso veditabbo –
atk-s0402a49:7_1: yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a49:7_4: yassa puggalassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a49:7_5: ayaṁ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū. Katamo ca puggalo neyyo,
atk-s0402a49:7_6: yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo neyyo.
atk-s0402a49:7_8: yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a49:9_1: Catutthe uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṁ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṁ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṁ kappeti,
atk-s0402a49:9_2: taṁ pana uṭṭhānaṁ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṁ nappaṭilabhati ,
atk-s0402a49:9_4: Cātumahārājike pana deve ādiṁ katvā sabbepi devā uṭṭhānavīriyena vinā puññaphalasseva upajīvanato kammaphalūpajīvino na uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino nāma.
atk-s0402a49:9_7: Imasmiṁ sutte puññaphalameva kammaphalanti adhippetaṁ, tañca tesaṁ natthi.
atk-s0402a49:11_2: dutiyo antarantarā kusalakārako lokiyaputhujjano, tatiyo sotāpanno,
atk-s0402a49:11_3: sakadāgāmianāgāminopi eteneva saṅgahitā. Catuttho khīṇāsavo. So hi ekanteneva anavajjo.
atk-s0402a49:13_2: dutiyo sukkhavipassako sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī ca, tatiyo anāgāmī.
atk-s0402a49:13_3: So hi yasmā taṅkhaṇikampi upapattinimittakaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilabhatiyeva,
atk-s0402a49:13_4: tasmā sukkhavipassakopi samādhismiṁ paripūrakārīyeva. Catuttho khīṇāsavoyeva .
atk-s0402a49:13_5: So hi sabbesaṁ sīlādipaccanīkānaṁ pahīnattā sabbattha paripūrakārī nāma.
atk-s0402a49:15_3: cittena araññe vasantopi gāmameva paviṭṭhoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a49:17_2: Na kusalā hotīti na chekā hoti.
atk-s0402a49:19_1: Dasame atthato pariyādānaṁ gacchatīti aṭṭhakathaṁ pucchito pariyādānaṁ parikkhayaṁ gacchati, kathetuṁ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a49:19_2: No byañjanatoti byañjanaṁ panassa pavattati na pariyādiyati. Eseva nayo sabbatthāti.
